body.name: KOHLER 3989-0 Highline Two-Piece Comfort Height Toilet with Dual-Flush and Elongated Bowl, White
features: Item may ship in more than one box and may arrive separately.Water surface size : 11-3/8" x 8" (289 mm x 203 mm).
Elongated bowl offers added room and comfort.
Comfort Height(R) feature offers a chair-height seat that makes sitting down and standing up easier for most adults.
Left-hand nested trip lever offers a choice of 1.1 or 1.6 gallons per flush (gpf).
Combination consists of the the K-4199 bowl and the K-4458 tank.
body.description: Product Description This Highline dual-flush toilet combines water savings with powerful flush performance. An innovative two-tone flush lever offers the choice of 1.1 or 1.6-Gallons per flush; the dual-flush lever is located on the side of the tank like a traditional toilet, leaving the top free for storage. The high-efficiency 1.1-Gallon flush reduces water use by more than 30-Percent over the 1.6-Gallon mode, which adds up to potential water savings of more than 4,000-Gallons per toilet, per year. From the Manufacturer This Highline dual-flush toilet combines water savings with powerful flush performance. An innovative two-tone flush lever offers the choice of 1.1 or 1.6-Gallons per flush; the dual-flush lever is located on the side of the tank like a traditional toilet, leaving the top free for storage. The high-efficiency 1.1-Gallon flush reduces water use by more than 30-Percent over the 1.6-Gallon mode, which adds up to potential water savings of more than 4,000-Gallons per toilet, per year.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #389,032 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement) #146 in Two-Piece Toilets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Unit for Our Bathroom
reviews.reviewText: Our previous units were 'water saver' ones that repeatedly plugged.This unit never plugs, even with a big deposit and loads of TP.The dual levers allow choice of super fast flushing of 1.1 or 1.6 gallons matched to whatever is needed.I just installed the second one in our home. We love the added height, dual flush, elongated bowl, clean design lines and flush levers on the side where they belong instead of on the top.I installed both units. Wax rings sealed tight, water connection matched without leaks and unit secured firmly to the floor. We bought a quiet close heavy duty Kohler seat that is extremely durable.The seating wax ring do not come with the toilet.The valve fills the tank rapidly and quietly at 55 lbs. of house pressure.Kohler included great fitting and looking covers for the floor mount bolts.You must provide your own tools to do the installation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good Toilet. Bad packaging by Amazon
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 of these toilets for a bathroom remodel. The first one arrived in about 5 days. The tank was fine but the bowl was broken on the back corner. Called Kohler and they were great and are sending out a replacement bowl via a different shipping method.Second toilet arrived today and once again the bowl is smashed. Same deal with Kohler.Long story short, Kohler has been awesome to work with but Amazon does an incredibly poor job of packaging the bowls.Now I have to wait another 2 weeks to get my toilets...Just order direct from Kohler and save yourself the hassle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the dual flush option
reviews.reviewText: This toilet is perfect. Good height. Easy to install. Plus good looking too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Looks great. Love the dual flush option. Works well so far but have noticed traces of debris left behind on full flush! Sits pretty high-up from floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great solid product. Quality built.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, does not come with a wax ring for bolts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, low impact way to buy a high quality large bathroom fixture
reviews.reviewText: This fixture functions very very well. Two choices for flushing---both very low water use ---and they both work at least as well as the old high water use one. And it is quieter than the old one. The item was shipped quickly and very well packed in two boxes, making it reasonable for us to get it upstairs before the plumber came. The water reservoir is slightly narrower than the previous twenty year old fixture, so you may need to patch up the painting behind it.The plumber believed that we got the same price or better than he would have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars FALSE ADVERTISING: A Toilet Without A Toilet Seat???
reviews.reviewText: FALSE ADVERTISING: The photo on Amazon shows a COMPLETE toilet, does it not? Love the toilet, my plumber has installed it, but very, very, very upset (P.O.'d really) that I have to wait over another week without a toilet. Let me ask you this: would you buy a car online only to later discover that it had no doors? So you have a car that sits in your garage for a week, and you're without transportation because you're waiting for the doors to arrive? Doors are pretty basic, you expect them to be included, right? Well, seats are pretty basic to a toilet are they not? You expect it includes a seat right? That's what's happened to me. The toilet was delivered but it HAD NO SEAT. And we're not talking about a huge additional expense, as the seat is only 40 lousy dollars. For that piddly amount, why not live up to consumer expectations and include it??? Or picture it lidless? Or charge $40 more?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars customer service really great
reviews.reviewText: This came in tons of pieces. SHipping box looked fine etc. Had to pay the plumber hired. However, as soon as I called efaucets they took care of me immediately with great customer service and shipped out another.I came back to redo my review it was so seemless.
It flushes very well. Easy to install

reviews.reviewTitle: Got it in 51 pieces , I was real thrilled
reviews.reviewText: Could not use itIt came broken

reviews.reviewTitle: Only the bottom arrived. Tank missing.
reviews.reviewText: Tank never arrived.. makes crunch time very difficult.
